title: SAVE with our LOWER PRICE * Bike to Anywhere! Bike Score 100 & Storage
posting_body: ['Enjoy The Good Life...', 'Welcome Home!', 'Seize your chance to live in The Irvington, one of the most iconic apartment communities in Portland, OR.', 'The Irvington', 'show contact info', '1532 NE 21st Avenue', 'Portland OR 97232', 'Live next-door to the heart of Portland’s hustle and bustle!', 'Got some downtime and need to unwind?', 'If you want somewhere serene to clear your head, you need look no further than our smoke-free community with long private balconies, gated off-street parking, free bike storage, and parcel lockers.', 'At The Irvington, we get that life can sometimes get hectic, busy, or just downright stressful.', 'We offer our residents a myriad of top-notch amenities to make life that much easier so that you have more time to kick back.', 'If you just need to get away and enjoy the city’s offerings, explore all of the shopping, dining, and entertainment that nearby downtown Portland has to offer!', 'With easy access to I-84 and I-5, The Irvington is just minutes away from Downtown Portland and The Pearl District.', 'Our Amenities', 'Interior Parcel Lockers and mail boxes', 'All New Brushed Nickel Lighting, Fixtures, and Hardware', 'Light Oak Hardwood Floors in All Living Areas', 'Private Exterior Storage Closet', 'Floor to Ceiling Windows', 'Gated Covered or Uncovered Parking*', 'New Stainless Steel Appliances', 'Abundant Closet Space Throughout', 'White Quartz Countertops', 'Historic Irvington Neighborhood', 'Private Deck / Patio with Living Room and Bedroom Access', 'Elevator Access to Floors 2-6', 'New Carpet in the Bedroom', 'Convenient Laundry Facility in Building', 'Professionally Managed by Princeton Property Management', 'The Irvington offers something for everyone.', 'See our available amenities to find something that speaks to you.', 'Get a sneak peek of the good life here at The Irvington.', 'Your home is your castle and a place to unwind and relax.', 'Our community offers you the very best of the city from the peaceful confines of the historic Irvington and Sullivan’s Gulch neighborhoods.', 'The Irvington provides residents with roomy one-bedroom apartment floor plans with modern design and filled with closets, so you can find the home that fits your lifestyle for years to come.', 'Our Walk Score of 87 makes us as a “Very Walkable” location and our Bike Score of 100 makes us a “Biker’s Paradise”.', 'Rest assured, you can explore the area and nearby Portland with or without a car.']
